description.@en: Hazel twig from twisted tree, a curse upon mine enemy . . .

effect.@en: After successfully casting (and foes in a Cone Template cannot or fail to Resist using Coordination), they suffer [[/roll 3D10]]+[WB] Damage and 9 Conflict. Roll Chaos Dice as you normally would for Injuries, but if any land on face ‘6,’ they suffer from Terror.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but your foe cannot Resist.

criticalFailure.@en: The wand snaps and the Spell rebounds toward you in a Cone Template, treated as a Critical Success.

reagents.@en: A single branch of a witch hazel tree, pointed outward
